name: Miss Toppings and the Kingdom of Sweet Candy
name_original: Miss Toppings and the Kingdom of Sweet Candy
description:
Miss Toppings has been robbed. A band of rascals has taken her precious candles, a gift of her deceased father carrying great sentimental and economical value.

 Most damsels would lament in their homes over their loss, but not Mrs Toppings. She didn't give it a second thought and made her way into the most dangerous neighbourhood in Candyvill to face the ruffians behind her robbery, as well as their leader, evil Pierre the Striped, willing to claim back what is hers.
